mapper.select: select * from tbl_memberInfo where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
select count(*) from tbl_memberInfo where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_memberInfo (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, user_tel, reg_date) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)

insert into tbl_memberDetail (user_id, user_nick, cate_no1, cate_no2, cate_no3, cate_etc, follower_cnt, following_cnt, user_grade, reg_date) values (#{user_id}, #{user_nick, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cate_no1, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cate_no2, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cate_no3, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cate_etc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{follower_cnt}, #{following_cnt}, #{user_grade, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, sysdate)
